import React, { useState } from "react"; import googleLogo from "../assets/googlemain.png"; import Axios from "axios"; const Signupform = () => { const url = "http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/user/register"; const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ // Initialize form fields fullname: "", email: "", address: "", company: "", password: "", confirm_password: "", }); function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); console.log("data sent"); // Call a function to send data to the database/API Axios.post(url, { fullname: formData.fullname, email: formData.email, address: formData.address, company: formData.company, password: formData.password, confirm_password: formData.confirm_password, }).then((res) => { // console.log(res.formData); }); } const handleChange = (e) => { // Update form data when input changes const newData = { ...formData }; newData[e.target.name] = e.target.value; setFormData(newData); console.log(newData); }; const [data, setData] = useState({}); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const fetchData = async () => { const requestData = { fullname: formData.fullname, email: formData.email, address: formData.address, company: formData.company, password: formData.password, confirm_password: formData.confirm_password, }; try { const response = await Axios.post(url, requestData); // Axios automatically throws an error for non-2xx responses const responseData = response.data; setData(responseData); } catch (error) { setError(error.message); } }; return ( 
{JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)}
); return (

); }; export default Signupform;
